"Border-Piercing Blade":
"Various enemies have suddenly appeared in
the Ruins area of planet Naberius, including
Mechs, Dragonkin and Oceanids.
We also have confirmed reports of an
unidentified enemy resembling a knight.
Could they have anything to do with the
enemies from other planets...?
Investigate and subdue it if necessary.
――――――――――――――――――――
Collect [1000] Quest Points to clear."
